comment: Copy this file to .llm-api-keys.json and fill in your actual API keys

openai.comment: Get your API key from https://platform.openai.com/api-keys

openrouter.comment: Get your API key from https://openrouter.ai/keys

usage.description: Use these keys in tests by importing this JSON file
usage.example: const keys = require('./.llm-api-keys.json'); await db.enhanceQuery('test', { provider: 'openai', model: keys.openai.model, apiKey: keys.openai.apiKey });
